EmailTemplate.description: Describes the steps to apply for an Export License for Publication.
EmailTemplate.name: Pubs - Export Controlled Publication
EmailTemplate.subject: Publication Export Review CASE-{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your request for a BendixKing publication.
The publication you've requested requires an Export License. Our records do not indicate that you possess the required License to allow access to this Publication.
To obtain a hard copy of this manual, please submit a PO for the requested pub number for $XX. If you have the required license, please forward the documentation and your case will be re-reviewed for processing. Please also include your Aircraft Serial and Registration numbers for quicker processing.
We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.
Thank you,
BendixKing Technical Publications Team
pubs@bendixking.com
Access our publications online at myaerospace.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
